positive.review: Its fun. I like it. In my opinion its not very useful for beginner streamers. It is probably useful for folks that have an audience already. Works for multi platforms at same time. Overall its good.

The single best investment we have made for our stream. The amount of engagement we get and retention because people just want to mess with their avatar is insane. Every time we take a break I just setup a boss fight and we loose virtually 0 viewers. Very easy to setup. Would highly recommend.
Fun little app to use even for a small streamer like me.

It really is a fun addition for your stream. I have yet to make some custom stuff, but I like that there is a descent free repository on the workshop, and there are some for sale on various sites others have made.

Amazing for streams! I absolutely love my little stream avatars, and so does my community! 
My favorite command is !mass fireworks. 
I highly recommend getting stream avatars so your chatters can be little guys on your stream.
Great wa for your Chat to interact, have fun w others while you game.
works great dont fully understand it all want to use it to the max  but struggling to but i'd say its worth getting for  viewer engagement, and it's fun to mess around with

This is great for streaming! I love how customizable it is and there's sooo many things that you can do with it! The only downside is that you really have to know how to do it yourself - or know someone who does - unless you want to settle for the few premade things there are available -- I can't even find a good place to find someone who can MAKE sprites... but I'm slowly learning :) I do love that the possibilties are endless - between different avatars, different avatar decorations to different nameplate fonts, colors, styles, background and decorations! OMG There's just sooo much you can do with it! And on top of that viewers LOVE the Battle Royale! I'm currently using the Mario premade - and I made a Bowswer's Battleship for the plane for the Battle Royale and really went "all out" with this Mario theme... just for testing it out tho... in time i'm gonna do something totally customized for my stream and I just know it will be awesome :) Love the app!
LOVE LOVE LOVE, lots of options for avatars and is highly enjoyed by the viewers.
All small to mid-size streamers should try out Stream Avatars! I will not elaborate on why.
Very great product you all have built! I love the MANY uses that are inherent in the design.
hehehe this has added so much to my channel its fun to mess around with. It is a little confusing to set up tho
just look at how much time i have on this game...... its so peak
Cute and easy to use
VERY COOL, LOTS OF SKINS
So cute.
g

I highly recommend it for your streams. Massive amounts of characters along with many neat niche games you could do. Definitely engaging for your community. 

A negative that definitely stands out to me is the somewhat tedious menu screen if you arent familiar with it can be a small learning curve.

Stream Avatars is super cute and helps with stream engagement.  I put the basketball game on whenever I take a 5 minute break and probably get more engagement with the game than during my actual stream :D  I've even made a few of my own sprites.  Recommended!
Its fun. I like it. In my opinion its not very useful for beginner streamers. It is probably useful for folks that have an audience already. Works for multi platforms at same time. Overall its good.

The single best investment we have made for our stream. The amount of engagement we get and retention because people just want to mess with their avatar is insane. Every time we take a break I just setup a boss fight and we loose virtually 0 viewers. Very easy to setup. Would highly recommend.
Fun little app to use even for a small streamer like me.

It really is a fun addition for your stream. I have yet to make some custom stuff, but I like that there is a descent free repository on the workshop, and there are some for sale on various sites others have made.

Amazing for streams! I absolutely love my little stream avatars, and so does my community! 
My favorite command is !mass fireworks. 
I highly recommend getting stream avatars so your chatters can be little guys on your stream.
Great wa for your Chat to interact, have fun w others while you game.
works great dont fully understand it all want to use it to the max  but struggling to but i'd say its worth getting for  viewer engagement, and it's fun to mess around with

This is great for streaming! I love how customizable it is and there's sooo many things that you can do with it! The only downside is that you really have to know how to do it yourself - or know someone who does - unless you want to settle for the few premade things there are available -- I can't even find a good place to find someone who can MAKE sprites... but I'm slowly learning :) I do love that the possibilties are endless - between different avatars, different avatar decorations to different nameplate fonts, colors, styles, background and decorations! OMG There's just sooo much you can do with it! And on top of that viewers LOVE the Battle Royale! I'm currently using the Mario premade - and I made a Bowswer's Battleship for the plane for the Battle Royale and really went "all out" with this Mario theme... just for testing it out tho... in time i'm gonna do something totally customized for my stream and I just know it will be awesome :) Love the app!
works great for fun creatures. dont have a clue how to work the bosses or any activities
Loads of fun for my viewers and myself. Has added a fun new element.
Fun little thing for viewers to play and interact with.
LOVE LOVE LOVE, lots of options for avatars and is highly enjoyed by the viewers.
All small to mid-size streamers should try out Stream Avatars! I will not elaborate on why.
Very great product you all have built! I love the MANY uses that are inherent in the design.
such a cute way to include your viewers in streams. It's a huge hit with my stream community
hehehe this has added so much to my channel its fun to mess around with. It is a little confusing to set up tho
This game sits in my library reminding me of my failed streaming career. 10/10
